com.mattrader.common

Class CandleSeriesCom

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mattrader.common.HistoricalDataSeriesCom
      • com.mattrader.common.CandleSeriesCom

  • public class CandleSeriesCom
extends HistoricalDataSeriesCom
    This class models the structure of a financial candle.
